data.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ فَتَنُواْ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ وَٱلۡمُؤۡمِنَٰتِ ثُمَّ لَمۡ يَتُوبُواْ فَلَهُمۡ عَذَابُ جَهَنَّمَ وَلَهُمۡ عَذَابُ ٱلۡحَرِيقِ

data.price: 11.Diggah, yeemeneeh meqe taamoomi abbaasite mari, jannatittey guba weeqaytitte как gexxa Ion, toh kaxxa maffaafa kinni.(asallama).
data.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ لَهُمۡ جَنَّٰتٞ تَجۡرِي مِن تَحۡتِهَا ٱلۡأَنۡهَٰرُۚ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡفَوۡزُ ٱلۡكَبِيرُ

data.price: 12.Diggah, ku Rabbik xibix kaxxam gibdi digaalah yabbixe waqdi.
data.arabic: إِنَّ بَطۡشَ رَبِّكَ لَشَدِيدٌ

data.price: 13.Diggah usuk ginó suge way tik qimbisaah, ken bayseek geeral ken gacisah.
data.arabic: إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ يُبۡدِئُ وَيُعِيدُ

data.price: 14.Kaadu usuk dambi cabtiliiy, kacanu Ie Rabbi moominiinih.
data.arabic: وَهُوَ ٱلۡغَفُورُ ٱلۡوَدُودُ

data.price: 15. Qarshi Ie Rabbiy nabna Ie kinni.
data.arabic: ذُو ٱلۡعَرۡشِ ٱلۡمَجِيدُ

data.price: 16.Isih faxxa haam abe kinni.
data.arabic: فَعَّالٞ لِّمَا يُرِيدُ

data.price: 17.Nabiyow isi ambiya dirabbosse Qandeh xaagi koo gufee?
data.arabic: هَلۡ أَتَىٰكَ حَدِيثُ ٱلۡجُنُودِ

data.price: 18. Firqawnaa kee samuud deqsita mara kinni.
data.arabic: فِرۡعَوۡنَ وَثَمُودَ

data.price: 19. Wonna hinnay koroosite mari ku dirabboysiyyat yan.
data.arabic: بَلِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ فِي تَكۡذِيبٖ

data.price: 20. Yalli keenik derrek marot ken yabbixe.
data.arabic: وَٱللَّهُ مِن وَرَآئِهِم مُّحِيطُۢ

data.price: 21. Koros kaa elle weelossa inna hinnay, usuk Qhuraanay nabna Ie kinni.
data.arabic: بَلۡ هُوَ قُرۡءَانٞ مَّجِيدٞ

data.price: 22. Usuk daccarsime luucih addal yan. (lowcal macfuuz kinnuk).
data.arabic: فِي لَوۡحٖ مَّحۡفُوظِۭ

data.price: 1. Yalli qaran kee bar mira cutuktal xiibite.
data.arabic: وَٱلسَّمَآءِ وَٱلطَّارِقِ

data.price: 2. Kaadu maca koo tiysixxigee bar mira cutukti kinnim?
data.arabic: وَمَآ أَدۡرَىٰكَ مَا ٱلطَّارِقُ

data.price: 3. Usuk bolok iyya cutuktay, diifut dite boohaysa kinni.
data.arabic: ٱلنَّجۡمُ ٱلثَّاقِبُ

data.price: 4. Hebeltô nafsi mayan malaykatti dacayrih amol kaak yanih akke waytek.
data.arabic: إِن كُلُّ نَفۡسٖ لَّمَّا عَلَيۡهَا حَافِظٞ

data.price: 5. Toysa Seehadayti wagitay cubbusay как ginniimem.
data.arabic: فَلۡيَنظُرِ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ مِمَّ خُلِقَ

data.price: 6. Usuk leey (woh daacoyta kinnuk) sissikuk kaqittak ginniime.
data.arabic: خُلِقَ مِن مَّآءٖ دَافِقٖ

data.price: 7. Numtin xiiron kee barrah aliilik fanak tawqc.
data.arabic: يَخۡرُجُ مِنۢ بَيۡنِ ٱلصُّلۡبِ وَٱلتَّرَآئِبِ

data.price: 8. Diggah tohuk kaa gine Rabbi kaa gacsaamah duddali kinni. rabeek lakal.
data.arabic: إِنَّهُۥ عَلَىٰ رَجۡعِهِۦ لَقَادِرٞ

data.price: 9. Kassit! Niyaayik lubbittet qellittem fokkaqsimtaah tamballu wayta ayro (woh Qhiyaamah ayró).
data.arabic: يَوۡمَ تُبۡلَى ٱلسَّرَآئِرُ

data.price: 10. Toysa Usuk çayla maliiy, cateyna mali.
data.arabic: فَمَا لَهُۥ مِن قُوَّةٖ وَلَا نَاصِرٖ

data.price: 11. Yalli qaraanay qagaa-qagita robiei xiibite.
data.arabic: وَٱلسَّمَآءِ ذَاتِ ٱلرَّجۡعِ

data.price: 12. Kaadu baaxoy teetik tawqeemit baqittal xiibite.
data.arabic: وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ ذَاتِ ٱلصَّدۡعِ

data.price: 13. Diggah Qhuraan yani deedalak baxissa maxcó kinni.
data.arabic: إِنَّهُۥ لَقَوۡلٞ فَصۡلٞ

data.price: 14. Kaadu usuk digir hinna.
data.arabic: وَمَا هُوَ بِٱلۡهَزۡلِ

data.price: 15. Diggah usun Nabiih uma malah malsan.(koros kinnuk).
data.arabic: إِنَّهُمۡ يَكِيدُونَ كَيۡدٗا

data.price: 16. Kaadu wohuk gibdi malah anu keenih malsa cakki yambulleemkch.
data.arabic: وَأَكِيدُ كَيۡدٗا

data.price: 17. Tokkel Nabiyow Koros qambaalis, digaalah obtit keenih maqataatakinaay dagoh gide ken qambaalis.
data.arabic: فَمَهِّلِ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ أَمۡهِلۡهُمۡ رُوَيۡدَۢا

data.price: 1. Ku Rabbiy kaxxa fayya leh migaq saytunnos!.
data.arabic: سَبِّحِ ٱسۡمَ رَبِّكَ ٱلۡأَعۡلَى

data.price: 2. Yallay ginoona gineeh massoyséh migaqa.
data.arabic: ٱلَّذِي خَلَقَ فَسَوَّىٰ

data.price: 3. Kaadu Kaay tu isih elle faxxa hee innal caggudusey gino tirri hee tet celtaah teetik faxximtaamah.
data.arabic: وَٱلَّذِي قَدَّرَ فَهَدَىٰ

data.price: 4. Kaadu Kaay anxax qayso baaxok yeyyeeqeh.
data.arabic: وَٱلَّذِيٓ أَخۡرَجَ ٱلۡمَرۡعَىٰ

data.price: 5. Tohuk wadir kafteeh data ruma tet abe.
data.arabic: فَجَعَلَهُۥ غُثَآءً أَحۡوَىٰ

data.price: 6. Nabiyow ama qhuraan koo akriyisennooh, inkinnah kaa mahawwenta.
data.arabic: سَنُقۡرِئُكَ فَلَا تَنسَىٰٓ

data.price: 7. Yalli faxem akke waytek, diggah usuk tambulleem kee qellittam yaaxigeh.(maxcoo kee taamak).
data.arabic: إِلَّا مَا شَآءَ ٱللَّهُۚ إِنَّهُۥ يَعۡلَمُ ٱلۡجَهۡرَ وَمَا يَخۡفَىٰ

data.price: 8. Kaadu maqaanê gita koh xabbacoysenno.
data.arabic: وَنُيَسِّرُكَ لِلۡيُسۡرَىٰ

data.price: 9. Tokkel Nabiyow isi mara Kassis! kassis tu-xiqek.
data.arabic: فَذَكِّرۡ إِن نَّفَعَتِ ٱلذِّكۡرَىٰ

data.price: 10. Yallak meesitah yan num kassite lek.(moomintu kinnuk).
data.arabic: سَيَذَّكَّرُ مَن يَخۡشَىٰ

data.price: 11. Kaadu gibdi umeyni kassitik axxeere-lek.(korosta kinnuk).
data.arabic: وَيَتَجَنَّبُهَا ٱلۡأَشۡقَى

data.price: 12. Каау kaxxa girâ cula.
data.arabic: ٱلَّذِي يَصۡلَى ٱلنَّارَ ٱلۡكُبۡرَىٰ

data.price: 13. Tohuk lakal usuk tet addal marabaay, mayanuwwa.
data.arabic: ثُمَّ لَا يَمُوتُ فِيهَا وَلَا يَحۡيَىٰ

data.price: 14. Nummah isi nafsi dambik say tunnoy se num naggooweh.
data.arabic: قَدۡ أَفۡلَحَ مَن تَزَكَّىٰ

data.price: 15. Kaadu isi Rabbih migaq cuseeh kaa inkittoyseeh, wonnaluk salaate num.
data.arabic: وَذَكَرَ ٱسۡمَ رَبِّهِۦ فَصَلَّىٰ

data.price: 16. Wonna hinnay isin addunyâ mano muxxussan akeerak.
data.arabic: بَلۡ تُؤۡثِرُونَ ٱلۡحَيَوٰةَ ٱلدُّنۡيَا

data.price: 17. Akeera mano tayseeh, raqtaah waartah.
data.arabic: وَٱلۡأٓخِرَةُ خَيۡرٞ وَأَبۡقَىٰٓ

data.price: 18. Diggah tama sin kassisnem naharsi kitoobal tan.
data.arabic: إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَفِي ٱلصُّحُفِ ٱلۡأُولَىٰ

data.price: 19. Toh Nabii Ibraahim kee Nabii Muusal obte kitooba.
data.arabic: صُحُفِ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَ وَمُوسَىٰ

data.price: 1. Nabiyow Qhiyaamah ayroy Ghaashiya deqsittah xaagi koo gufeh innaa?
data.arabic: هَلۡ أَتَىٰكَ حَدِيثُ ٱلۡغَٰشِيَةِ

data.price: 2. Woo ayro Koros foocitte taqunxeeh digaalat.
data.arabic: وُجُوهٞ يَوۡمَئِذٍ خَٰشِعَةٌ

data.price: 3. Is addunyal umaaneenâ taamittaah, akeeral girah addal digaalâ taqabta.
data.arabic: عَامِلَةٞ نَّاصِبَةٞ

data.price: 4. Niqnah solak tan girá culta.
data.arabic: تَصۡلَىٰ نَارًا حَامِيَةٗ

data.price: 5. Niqnâ gibdah facta darah leek tet yafqen.
data.arabic: تُسۡقَىٰ مِنۡ عَيۡنٍ ءَانِيَةٖ

data.price: 6. Usun maaqó malón uma caxay dariiq deqsitta akke waytek.
data.arabic: لَّيۡسَ لَهُمۡ طَعَامٌ إِلَّا مِن ضَرِيعٖ

data.price: 7. Is magablussaay, qululuk xiqtam mali.
data.arabic: لَّا يُسۡمِنُ وَلَا يُغۡنِي مِن جُوعٖ

data.price: 8. Moominiin foocitte woo ayro saytuniih wir itta.
data.arabic: وُجُوهٞ يَوۡمَئِذٖ نَّاعِمَةٞ

data.price: 9. Addunyal abitte isi meqe taama takcineeh ruffu itta akeeral.
data.arabic: لِّسَعۡيِهَا رَاضِيَةٞ

data.price: 10. Fayya iyya jannatih addal.
data.arabic: فِي جَنَّةٍ عَالِيَةٖ

data.price: 11. Uma yab kay addal ma taabba.
data.arabic: لَّا تَسۡمَعُ فِيهَا لَٰغِيَةٗ

data.price: 12. Kay addal gexxa dara tan.
data.arabic: فِيهَا عَيۡنٞ جَارِيَةٞ

data.price: 13. Fayya iyya qaraakiy kay addal yan.
data.arabic: فِيهَا سُرُرٞ مَّرۡفُوعَةٞ

data.price: 14. Kaadu kobboyaayiy maaqabah massoysimteeh daroorï qaxal heeni kay addal tan edde yaaquboonuh.
data.arabic: وَأَكۡوَابٞ مَّوۡضُوعَةٞ

data.price: 15.Kaadu Rooruh tan barkumaami (makaddid) kay addal tan.
data.arabic: وَنَمَارِقُ مَصۡفُوفَةٞ

data.price: 16.Kaadu fidut tan fidooda kay addal tan.
data.arabic: وَزَرَابِيُّ مَبۡثُوثَةٌ

data.price: 17. Та koros gaali elle ginniime inna ma wagittaay ma cubbussaa?
data.arabic: أَفَلَا يَنظُرُونَ إِلَى ٱلۡإِبِلِ كَيۡفَ خُلِقَتۡ

data.price: 18.Kaadu qaran fayya elle heen inna?
data.arabic: وَإِلَى ٱلسَّمَآءِ كَيۡفَ رُفِعَتۡ

data.price: 19.Kaadu qaleela elle dabsimteeh, karersimte inna?
data.arabic: وَإِلَى ٱلۡجِبَالِ كَيۡفَ نُصِبَتۡ

data.price: 20. Kaadu baaxó elle fidsimte inna ?
data.arabic: وَإِلَى ٱلۡأَرۡضِ كَيۡفَ سُطِحَتۡ

data.price: 21. Toysa kassis! Nabiyow atu cagalah kassiisé kinnitok.
data.arabic: فَذَكِّرۡ إِنَّمَآ أَنتَ مُذَكِّرٞ

data.price: 22. Atu iimaanah ken dirkisa num hinnito.
data.arabic: لَّسۡتَ عَلَيۡهِم بِمُصَيۡطِرٍ

data.price: 23. Kinnih immay iimaanat derre cabeeh, koroosite num,
data.arabic: إِلَّا مَن تَوَلَّىٰ وَكَفَرَ

data.price: 24. Toysa Yalli kaxxa digaalah kaa digaale Ie.
data.arabic: فَيُعَذِّبُهُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡعَذَابَ ٱلۡأَكۡبَرَ

data.price: 25. Diggah ken madaara nee fan akkele rabeeniik lakal.
data.arabic: إِنَّ إِلَيۡنَآ إِيَابَهُمۡ

data.price: 26. Tohuk lakal diggah ken cisab (fokkaaqo) kee galtó nel tan.
data.arabic: ثُمَّ إِنَّ عَلَيۡنَا حِسَابَهُم

data.price: 1. Yalli maacal xiibite.
data.arabic: وَٱلۡفَجۡرِ

data.price: 2. Kaadu qarafah alsak naharsi tabna barai xiibite.
data.arabic: وَلَيَالٍ عَشۡرٖ

data.price: 3. Kaadu ummaan iimik nammay takkem (xibbaan) kee alluudah taniimil xiibite.
data.arabic: وَٱلشَّفۡعِ وَٱلۡوَتۡرِ

data.price: 4. Kaadu bari yamaate waqdii kee bari dardara waqdii xiibite.
data.arabic: وَٱلَّيۡلِ إِذَا يَسۡرِ

data.price: 5. Tama hiimiy yalli elle xiibitet kas le numuh kaa xiqtah tan xiiba tanii? yeey, tanih.
data.arabic: هَلۡ فِي ذَٰلِكَ قَسَمٞ لِّذِي حِجۡرٍ

data.price: 6. Ma tablannaa! Nabiyow ku Rabbi Qaad deqsita marak kah abenna?
data.arabic: أَلَمۡ تَرَ كَيۡفَ فَعَلَ رَبُّكَ بِعَادٍ

data.price: 7. Usun Iram deqsittâ kedoy kaxxa caylaay fayya le xisne luk tene.
data.arabic: إِرَمَ ذَاتِ ٱلۡعِمَادِ

data.price: 8. Is tet celtám Baaxô bagul как ginniime wayte kedó kinni.
data.arabic: ٱلَّتِي لَمۡ يُخۡلَقۡ مِثۡلُهَا فِي ٱلۡبِلَٰدِ

data.price: 9. Kaadu Nabiyow ku Rabbi Samuud deqsita maray, qaleela ureeh, qarwah haysitek abem ma tablannaa Waad deqsita daqaaral?
data.arabic: وَثَمُودَ ٱلَّذِينَ جَابُواْ ٱلصَّخۡرَ بِٱلۡوَادِ

data.price: 10.Kaadu Firqawnay xiikooluy (kadeeday) sinam edde digaala lek kah abe inna?
data.arabic: وَفِرۡعَوۡنَ ذِي ٱلۡأَوۡتَادِ

data.price: 11. Usun caddok tatre mara baaxol.
data.arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ طَغَوۡاْ فِي ٱلۡبِلَٰدِ

data.price: 12. Edde luk usun tet addal umaane yeymeggee mara.
data.arabic: فَأَكۡثَرُواْ فِيهَا ٱلۡفَسَادَ

data.price: 13.Tokkel Ku Rabbi lafit Íe digaala keenil caxeeh, oobise.
data.arabic: فَصَبَّ عَلَيۡهِمۡ رَبُّكَ سَوۡطَ عَذَابٍ

data.price: 14.Nabiyow diggah, ku Rabbi külli seehadaytih taama dacrisaah ken elle gälte le.
data.arabic: إِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَبِٱلۡمِرۡصَادِ

data.price: 15. Seehadaytuh tu gactek kay Rabbi kaa yiqiyyireeh (mokkoreeh), kaah yemqeeh kaa hatkise kaa tekkek, yi Rabbi yoh yemqeh iyya.
data.arabic: فَأَمَّا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ إِذَا مَا ٱبۡتَلَىٰهُ رَبُّهُۥ فَأَكۡرَمَهُۥ وَنَعَّمَهُۥ فَيَقُولُ رَبِّيٓ أَكۡرَمَنِ

data.price: 16. Kaadu kaa yiqiyyireeh, Isi quusi (rizqhi) kaal ceyse kaa tekkek, yi Rabbi yoo yuyqunxeh iyya.
data.arabic: وَأَمَّآ إِذَا مَا ٱبۡتَلَىٰهُ فَقَدَرَ عَلَيۡهِ رِزۡقَهُۥ فَيَقُولُ رَبِّيٓ أَهَٰنَنِ

data.price: 17. Tu elle tan im tonna hinna а seehadaytow, isin qayxixxuh matamqaanaay kaa matassakaxxan.
data.arabic: كَلَّاۖ بَل لَّا تُكۡرِمُونَ ٱلۡيَتِيمَ

data.price: 18.Kaadu tu dagoyti askamiyyah sitta milsissan (ma lallabtan).
data.arabic: وَلَا تَحَٰٓضُّونَ عَلَىٰ طَعَامِ ٱلۡمِسۡكِينِ

data.price: 19. Kaadu nagrä maalu cakki maliinoh gibdi makmoh takmen.
data.arabic: وَتَأۡكُلُونَ ٱلتُّرَاثَ أَكۡلٗا لَّمّٗا

data.price: 20. Kaadu maalu kaxxa kacanuh kicinton.
data.arabic: وَتُحِبُّونَ ٱلۡمَالَ حُبّٗا جَمّٗا

data.price: 21. Tonna hinnay, baaxó kaxxa angoyyih tangayyeeh, bululsimiyyah bululsimta waqdi,
data.arabic: كَلَّآۖ إِذَا دُكَّتِ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ دَكّٗا دَكّٗا

data.price: 22. Kaadu Nabiyow ku Rabbi yamaateeh, malayka massa massah (saffi saffih) gacta,
data.arabic: وَجَآءَ رَبُّكَ وَٱلۡمَلَكُ صَفّٗا صَفّٗا

data.price: 23. Kaadu woo ayró (Qhiyaamah ayro kinnuk) jahannam bahsimah, too ayró seehadayti iimaan kee meqe taamay addunyal cinak suge kassitah, woo kassit kee nadaama mannal tu kaah xiqtaa?
data.arabic: وَجِاْيٓءَ يَوۡمَئِذِۭ بِجَهَنَّمَۚ يَوۡمَئِذٖ يَتَذَكَّرُ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ وَأَنَّىٰ لَهُ ٱلذِّكۡرَىٰ

data.price: 24. Maganey! inni manol maqaané uysukumeh suginniyoy iyya.
data.arabic: يَقُولُ يَٰلَيۡتَنِي قَدَّمۡتُ لِحَيَاتِي

data.price: 25. Woo saaku Yallih digaalah innah tan digaalah, num ma digaala.
data.arabic: فَيَوۡمَئِذٖ لَّا يُعَذِّبُ عَذَابَهُۥٓ أَحَدٞ

data.price: 26. Kaadu Yallih axawih innah yan axawah num ma yaxaa.
data.arabic: وَلَا يُوثِقُ وَثَاقَهُۥٓ أَحَدٞ

data.price: 27. Kee satta iyye nafsow. (yallih cusiyyaa kee iimaanat).
data.arabic: يَٰٓأَيَّتُهَا ٱلنَّفۡسُ ٱلۡمُطۡمَئِنَّةُ

data.price: 28. Isi Rabbí fanah uduur usuk koh yeceem oggolak akcanuk, usuk ku meqe taama kok oggoleeh, Raabitehik.
data.arabic: ٱرۡجِعِيٓ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكِ رَاضِيَةٗ مَّرۡضِيَّةٗ

data.price: 29. Toysa Yi naqoosay meqey moominiinih tanih loowot cul.
data.arabic: فَٱدۡخُلِي فِي عِبَٰدِي

data.price: 30. Kaadu kecnî luk Yi jannat cui.
data.arabic: وَٱدۡخُلِي جَنَّتِي

data.price: 1. Ta baaxól xiibita. (makka kinnuk).
data.arabic: لَآ أُقۡسِمُ بِهَٰذَا ٱلۡبَلَدِ

data.price: 2. Nabiyow atu ta baaxol dabqih yan num kinnito.
data.arabic: وَأَنتَ حِلُّۢ بِهَٰذَا ٱلۡبَلَدِ

data.price: 3. Kaadu xaltanii kee xalecnimil xiibita.
data.arabic: وَوَالِدٖ وَمَا وَلَدَ

data.price: 4. Nummah seehadaytu taqabih ginne addunyal rabba iyyam fan.
data.arabic: لَقَدۡ خَلَقۡنَا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ فِي كَبَدٍ

data.price: 5. Usuk (korosta kinnuk) num ise duude waam yakkalee?
data.arabic: أَيَحۡسَبُ أَن لَّن يَقۡدِرَ عَلَيۡهِ أَحَدٞ

data.price: 6. Hiddootak: maggo maalu Mucammad qadaawatah bayse iyya.
data.arabic: يَقُولُ أَهۡلَكۡتُ مَالٗا لُّبَدًا

data.price: 7. Usuk num isi ablewaam yakkalee? yalli kaa yablehik.
data.arabic: أَيَحۡسَبُ أَن لَّمۡ يَرَهُۥٓ أَحَدٌ

data.price: 8. Namma inti kaah mahanninoo edde yabaluh?
data.arabic: أَلَمۡ نَجۡعَل لَّهُۥ عَيۡنَيۡنِ

data.price: 9. Kaadu arrabaa kee namma sokto (arrobta kinnuk) kaah mahanninoo?
data.arabic: وَلِسَانٗا وَشَفَتَيۡنِ

data.price: 10.Kaadu namma gita kaah mabaxxaqisinninoo? (umaanee kee maqaanê gita kinnuk).
data.arabic: وَهَدَيۡنَٰهُ ٱلنَّجۡدَيۡنِ

data.price: 11.Toysa Isi maalu meqe gital yaceemit dook (woh akeerâ gibdaabina kinnuk) macah tatre wee?
data.arabic: فَلَا ٱقۡتَحَمَ ٱلۡعَقَبَةَ

data.price: 12. doô tatur kinnim maca koo tiysixxigeeh?
data.arabic: وَمَآ أَدۡرَىٰكَ مَا ٱلۡعَقَبَةُ

data.price: 13. Woh naqoosannuk moomintoh tan naqso currusaanama.
data.arabic: فَكُّ رَقَبَةٍ

data.price: 14. Hinnay qulul edde gibdih yan ayróh addat maaqo yaskameenimi.
data.arabic: أَوۡ إِطۡعَٰمٞ فِي يَوۡمٖ ذِي مَسۡغَبَةٖ

data.price: 15. Xayi qayxixxuy ramad le yaskameenimi.
data.arabic: يَتِيمٗا ذَا مَقۡرَبَةٍ

data.price: 16. Hinnay tumaliy tussinnah burtat kafe yaskameenimi.
data.arabic: أَوۡ مِسۡكِينٗا ذَا مَتۡرَبَةٖ

data.price: 17. Wohuk lakal yeemeneeh, sabril titta farriimeeh, xuwaawal titta farriime marih num yakkeemi.
data.arabic: ثُمَّ كَانَ مِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَتَوَاصَوۡاْ بِٱلصَّبۡرِ وَتَوَاصَوۡاْ بِٱلۡمَرۡحَمَةِ

data.price: 18. Woh migdi maray moominiinih yani kinni.
data.arabic: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡمَيۡمَنَةِ

data.price: 19. Kaadu ni aayootal (Qhuraan kinnuk) koroositc mari, usun guri mara .
data.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا هُمۡ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡمَشۡـَٔمَةِ

data.price: 20. Usun keenil alfimte girah addat yanin.
data.arabic: عَلَيۡهِمۡ نَارٞ مُّؤۡصَدَةُۢ

data.price: 1. Yalli ayróo kee tet wallaqental xiibite.
data.arabic: وَٱلشَّمۡسِ وَضُحَىٰهَا

data.price: 2. Kaadu alsâl xiibite, teetil katayta waqdi.
data.arabic: وَٱلۡقَمَرِ إِذَا تَلَىٰهَا

data.price: 3. Kaadu laqól xiibite, is dite kalta waqdi.
data.arabic: وَٱلنَّهَارِ إِذَا جَلَّىٰهَا

data.price: 4. Kaadu barai xiibite, usuk ditet baaxó buula waqdi.
data.arabic: وَٱلَّيۡلِ إِذَا يَغۡشَىٰهَا

data.price: 5. Kaadu qaran kee qaran xise Rabbi xiibite.
data.arabic: وَٱلسَّمَآءِ وَمَا بَنَىٰهَا

data.price: 6. Kaadu baaxóo kee baaxó fidse Rabbil xiibite.
data.arabic: وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا طَحَىٰهَا

data.price: 7. Kaadu nafsii kee nafsi massoyse Rabbil xiibite.
data.arabic: وَنَفۡسٖ وَمَا سَوَّىٰهَا

data.price: 8. Tokkel umaanê gitaa kee maqaane teetik edde tan gita teetih baxxaqiseh.
data.arabic: فَأَلۡهَمَهَا فُجُورَهَا وَتَقۡوَىٰهَا

data.price: 9. Nummah dambik tet saytunnoyse num naggooweh.
data.arabic: قَدۡ أَفۡلَحَ مَن زَكَّىٰهَا

data.price: 10. Kaadu nummah umaanet tet yubkune num baxaysiteh.
data.arabic: وَقَدۡ خَابَ مَن دَسَّىٰهَا

data.price: 11. Samuud deqsita mari Yallih farmoyta Nabii Saalic dirabboyseh, usun umaanet caddok tatreenimih sabbatah.
data.arabic: كَذَّبَتۡ ثَمُودُ بِطَغۡوَىٰهَآ

data.price: 12.Woo marak umaaneh gibdi num kaqteeh alá yusguude waqdi.
data.arabic: إِذِ ٱنۢبَعَثَ أَشۡقَىٰهَا

data.price: 13.Tokkel Yallih farmoyti Nabii saalic keenik iyyeh: Yallih alá umaaneh maxaginaay, tet arakih ayró teetih caba.
data.arabic: فَقَالَ لَهُمۡ رَسُولُ ٱللَّهِ نَاقَةَ ٱللَّهِ وَسُقۡيَٰهَا

data.price: 14.Tokkel kaa dirabboyseeniih, tet yusguudeeniih, ken Rabbi digaalá ken duuduseh alifii keenil hee ken dambih, Woo digaalá keenil massoyseh.(num keenik ma- raaqinna woo digaalák).
data.arabic: فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَعَقَرُوهَا فَدَمۡدَمَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ رَبُّهُم بِذَنۢبِهِمۡ فَسَوَّىٰهَا

data.price: 15.Yalli keenil baaheemik ciggiiliyyah kak meesitâ mali.
data.arabic: وَلَا يَخَافُ عُقۡبَٰهَا

data.price: 1. Yalli barai xiibite, bari ditet baaxó buula waqdi,
data.arabic: وَٱلَّيۡلِ إِذَا يَغۡشَىٰ

data.price: 2. Kaadu laqól xiibite, is diifut baaxó ifissi hayta waqdi,
data.arabic: وَٱلنَّهَارِ إِذَا تَجَلَّىٰ

data.price: 3. Kaadu labtii kee saytiyá gine Rabbi isil xiibite.
data.arabic: وَمَا خَلَقَ ٱلذَّكَرَ وَٱلۡأُنثَىٰٓ

data.price: 4. Diggah sin taama sissinih, isin addunyah taamita maraa kee akeerah taamita marah anuk.
data.arabic: إِنَّ سَعۡيَكُمۡ لَشَتَّىٰ

data.price: 5. Tokkel Yalli acuya iyyem yeceeh, Yallak meesite numuh tu-gactek,
data.arabic: فَأَمَّا مَنۡ أَعۡطَىٰ وَٱتَّقَىٰ

data.price: 6. Kaadu maqaaney (jannat kinnuk) yalli meqe marah massoyse nummaysek,
data.arabic: وَصَدَّقَ بِٱلۡحُسۡنَىٰ

data.price: 7. Toysa maqaanê gita kaah xabbacoysenno.
data.arabic: فَسَنُيَسِّرُهُۥ لِلۡيُسۡرَىٰ

data.price: 8. Kaadu cillaaliteeh, Yallak gaddalime numuh tu-gactek,
data.arabic: وَأَمَّا مَنۢ بَخِلَ وَٱسۡتَغۡنَىٰ

data.price: 9. Kaadu maqaaney (jannat kinnuk) yalli meqe marah massoyse dirabboysek.
data.arabic: وَكَذَّبَ بِٱلۡحُسۡنَىٰ

data.price: 10. Toysa umaanê gita kaal xabbacoysenno.
data.arabic: فَسَنُيَسِّرُهُۥ لِلۡعُسۡرَىٰ

data.price: 11. Usuk girat rada waqdi, kay maali tu kaah maxiqa.
data.arabic: وَمَا يُغۡنِي عَنۡهُ مَالُهُۥٓ إِذَا تَرَدَّىٰٓ

data.price: 12. Diggah tirtó gitay massa Ie baxxaqisnam nel tan.
data.arabic: إِنَّ عَلَيۡنَا لَلۡهُدَىٰ

data.price: 13.Kaadu diggah ellecabô dabqii (akeera) kee naharsi dabqii (addunyal) cnni ittam inkih nanu lino.
data.arabic: وَإِنَّ لَنَا لَلۡأٓخِرَةَ وَٱلۡأُولَىٰ

data.price: 14. Toysa, urtah hadiidigta girai sin meesiisa.
data.arabic: فَأَنذَرۡتُكُمۡ نَارٗا تَلَظَّىٰ

data.price: 15. Tet cultam matan gibdi umeyna akke waytek.
data.arabic: لَا يَصۡلَىٰهَآ إِلَّا ٱلۡأَشۡقَى

data.price: 16.Usuk Nabii dirabboyseeh, iimaanat derre cabe numu.
data.arabic: ٱلَّذِي كَذَّبَ وَتَوَلَّىٰ

data.price: 17. Teetik axxersimele Yallak kaxxam meesita num.
data.arabic: وَسَيُجَنَّبُهَا ٱلۡأَتۡقَى

data.price: 18.Usuk isi maalu yacee numu, ise saytunnoysâ gideh.
data.arabic: ٱلَّذِي يُؤۡتِي مَالَهُۥ يَتَزَكَّىٰ

data.price: 19. Kaadu hebltô numuy kay xaqul elle galtima niqmat ley kaah yemqe mayan.
data.arabic: وَمَا لِأَحَدٍ عِندَهُۥ مِن نِّعۡمَةٖ تُجۡزَىٰٓ

data.price: 20. Kinnih immay, usuk tamah kah abem fayya iyya Rabbih foocih fayxi kinni.
data.arabic: إِلَّا ٱبۡتِغَآءَ وَجۡهِ رَبِّهِ ٱلۡأَعۡلَىٰ

data.price: 21. Kaadu usuk sarrah galtot ruffu axceleeh teetit leedele jannat culuwaa saaku.
data.arabic: وَلَسَوۡفَ يَرۡضَىٰ

data.price: 1. Yalli wallaqental xiibite.
data.arabic: وَٱلضُّحَىٰ

data.price: 2. Kaadu bari diteh mudugi yakke waqdil xiibite.
data.arabic: وَٱلَّيۡلِ إِذَا سَجَىٰ

data.price: 3. Nabiyow ku Rabbi koo cabe weeh, koo anqibe weemil.
data.arabic: مَا وَدَّعَكَ رَبُّكَ وَمَا قَلَىٰ

data.price: 4. Kaadu diggah, wadirsitto (akecra) naharsittok (addunyak) koh tayseemil.
data.arabic: وَلَلۡأٓخِرَةُ خَيۡرٞ لَّكَ مِنَ ٱلۡأُولَىٰ

data.price: 5. Kaadu ku Rabbi sarroh (akeeral) kulli niqmat koh aceeleeh, kaat leedettooh ruffu kaat axcetto.
data.arabic: وَلَسَوۡفَ يُعۡطِيكَ رَبُّكَ فَتَرۡضَىٰٓ

data.price: 6. Nabiyow ku Rabbi qayxixxuh koo geeh, aracay elle orobta koh maabinnaa? abeh.
data.arabic: أَلَمۡ يَجِدۡكَ يَتِيمٗا فَـَٔاوَىٰ

data.price: 7. Kaadu kitab kee iimaan kinnim aaxige waa numuy garcit yanih koo geeh, tirri koo mahannaa?
data.arabic: وَوَجَدَكَ ضَآلّٗا فَهَدَىٰ

data.price: 8. Kaadu tu malih koo geeh, koo magaddalisinnaa?
data.arabic: وَوَجَدَكَ عَآئِلٗا فَأَغۡنَىٰ

data.price: 9. Toysa atu toh teexegek, qayxixxu Íe cakkik ma gutqin.
data.arabic: فَأَمَّا ٱلۡيَتِيمَ فَلَا تَقۡهَرۡ

data.price: 10.Kaadu kaliaci aba numuh tu gactek, kaa ma xiiriyinay meqe qangara kaal gacis.
data.arabic: وَأَمَّا ٱلسَّآئِلَ فَلَا تَنۡهَرۡ

data.price: 11.Ku Rabbih niqmatah tugactek, kaat walalaay kaa elle faatit!.
data.arabic: وَأَمَّا بِنِعۡمَةِ رَبِّكَ فَحَدِّثۡ

data.price: 1. Nabiyow Alii koh farakka ma hanninoo islaamaninnoo kee nubuwwannul?
data.arabic: أَلَمۡ نَشۡرَحۡ لَكَ صَدۡرَكَ

data.price: 2. Kaadu qilsi quuka kok moobisinninoo?
data.arabic: وَوَضَعۡنَا عَنكَ وِزۡرَكَ

data.price: 3. Qilsi quukay xiiron kok yiyqilseek.
data.arabic: ٱلَّذِيٓ أَنقَضَ ظَهۡرَكَ

data.price: 4. Kaadu fayya koh mahanninoo ku xagar (galab) xago?
data.arabic: وَرَفَعۡنَا لَكَ ذِكۡرَكَ

data.price: 5. Toysa diggah gibdaabinâ luk xabca tan.
data.arabic: فَإِنَّ مَعَ ٱلۡعُسۡرِ يُسۡرًا

data.price: 6. Diggah gibdaabinâ luk xabca tan.
data.arabic: إِنَّ مَعَ ٱلۡعُسۡرِ يُسۡرٗا

data.price: 7. Toysa Nabiyow isi caagiidak tamurruqe waqdi, qibaadat taqabaay teetil ingicilliy.
data.arabic: فَإِذَا فَرَغۡتَ فَٱنصَبۡ

data.price: 8. Kaadu Ku Rabbih xaqul taniimih sangeelaay kaa kallacit (jannat kinnuk).
data.arabic: وَإِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ فَٱرۡغَب

data.price: 1. Yalli xiibiteh Tiin kee Zaytuun deqsitta namma caxal.
data.arabic: وَٱلتِّينِ وَٱلزَّيۡتُونِ

data.price: 2. Kaadu qaley Tuuri siina deqsittal xiibite.
data.arabic: وَطُورِ سِينِينَ

data.price: 3. Kaadu a baaxoy saay lei xiibite. (Макка kinnuk)
data.arabic: وَهَٰذَا ٱلۡبَلَدِ ٱلۡأَمِينِ

data.price: 4. Nummah seehadaytu tayse weelol ginne.
data.arabic: لَقَدۡ خَلَقۡنَا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ فِيٓ أَحۡسَنِ تَقۡوِيمٖ

data.price: 5. Wohuk lakal usuk yallih amri oggole weeh, kay farmoytit kataate week girak gubi gubah kaa gacsenno.
data.arabic: ثُمَّ رَدَدۡنَٰهُ أَسۡفَلَ سَٰفِلِينَ

data.price: 6. Takkay ikkal, yeemeneeh meqe taamoomi abbaasite mari, aggiriqqe wayta galtó le akeeral.
data.arabic: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ فَلَهُمۡ أَجۡرٌ غَيۡرُ مَمۡنُونٖ

data.price: 7. Tokkel tahak wadir seehadaytow galtóh ayróh (Qhiyaamah ayró kinnuk) dirabboysiyyat maca koo bahtaah?
data.arabic: فَمَا يُكَذِّبُكَ بَعۡدُ بِٱلدِّينِ

data.price: 8. Yalli mekla abba haytaamak meklah yaysi hinnaa? Yeey, kinnih.
data.arabic: أَلَيۡسَ ٱللَّهُ بِأَحۡكَمِ ٱلۡحَٰكِمِينَ

data.price: 1. Nabiyow ku Rabbiy gino gineh yanih migaaqal ikriy.
data.arabic: ٱقۡرَأۡ بِٱسۡمِ رَبِّكَ ٱلَّذِي خَلَقَ

data.price: 2. Seehadaytu dabloytak gine Rabbi kinni.
data.arabic: خَلَقَ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ مِنۡ عَلَقٍ

data.price: 3. Nabiyow! ku Rabbiy kaxxa cinda leh migaaqal ikriy.
data.arabic: ٱقۡرَأۡ وَرَبُّكَ ٱلۡأَكۡرَمُ

data.price: 4. Usuk kalamat elle yaktuben gurra barse Rabbi kinni.
data.arabic: ٱلَّذِي عَلَّمَ بِٱلۡقَلَمِ

data.price: 5. Usuk seehadaytu, aaxaguk suge weem barse Rabbi kinni.
data.arabic: عَلَّمَ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ مَا لَمۡ يَعۡلَمۡ

data.price: 6. Nummah, diggah seehadayti umaanet caddok tatrah.
data.arabic: كَلَّآ إِنَّ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ لَيَطۡغَىٰٓ

data.price: 7. Gaddalitem isik yable waqdi.
data.arabic: أَن رَّءَاهُ ٱسۡتَغۡنَىٰٓ

data.price: 8. Diggah madaara ku Rabbí fanah takke Nabiyow.
data.arabic: إِنَّ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ ٱلرُّجۡعَىٰٓ

data.price: 9. Nabiyow tableh innaa a numuy waasa? (abu jahal kinnuk).
data.arabic: أَرَءَيۡتَ ٱلَّذِي يَنۡهَىٰ

data.price: 10.Yallih naqsi (Nabii Mucammad kinnuk) salat aba waqdi?
data.arabic: عَبۡدًا إِذَا صَلَّىٰٓ

data.price: 11.Yoh warisey ta salaatak waasâ num, usuk tirtô bagul yene kaa tekkek.
data.arabic: أَرَءَيۡتَ إِن كَانَ عَلَى ٱلۡهُدَىٰٓ

data.price: 12.Hinnay Yallak meesil amrisa num yekkek. (wohuk anninnal kaa waasaah).
data.arabic: أَوۡ أَمَرَ بِٱلتَّقۡوَىٰٓ

data.price: 13.Nabiyow! Yoh warisey ta sinam waasa num Qhuraan dirabboysech, iimaanat derre cabc kaa tekkek.
data.arabic: أَرَءَيۡتَ إِن كَذَّبَ وَتَوَلَّىٰٓ

data.price: 14.Usuk maaxiginnaa? Diggah Yalli usuk abba haam yable Rabbi kinnim?
data.arabic: أَلَمۡ يَعۡلَم بِأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَرَىٰ

data.price: 15. Caagid usuk (abu jahal kinnuk) elle yakkale inna hinna, usuk tamahak kate wee kaa tekkek gombo kaak gibdi xibixih abbixenno, jahannam girat kaa gasiyak.
data.arabic: كَلَّا لَئِن لَّمۡ يَنتَهِ لَنَسۡفَعَۢا بِٱلنَّاصِيَةِ

data.price: 16.Kay gombo, dirabley, hoxa leh tani kinni.
data.arabic: نَاصِيَةٖ كَٰذِبَةٍ خَاطِئَةٖ

data.price: 17. Tokkel usuk kaa qokla marah deerisay.
data.arabic: فَلۡيَدۡعُ نَادِيَهُۥ

data.price: 18.Nanu girá dacrissa malaykay girai sinam digaaltah seecennok.
data.arabic: سَنَدۡعُ ٱلزَّبَانِيَةَ

data.price: 19.Caagid usuk (abu jahal kinnuk) elle yakkalc inna hinna, Nabiyow kay yab moggolinaay, salaatah kummaataay isi Rabbit xayyow.
data.arabic: كَلَّا لَا تُطِعۡهُ وَٱسۡجُدۡۤ وَٱقۡتَرِب۩

data.price: 1. Diggah Nanu muxxó íe baray leylatul Qhadri deqsitat kaa (Qhuraan kinnuk) oobisne Ramdaanak.
data.arabic: إِنَّآ أَنزَلۡنَٰهُ فِي لَيۡلَةِ ٱلۡقَدۡرِ

data.price: 2. Nabiyow leylatul Qhadri bar kinnim maca koo tiysixxigeeh?
data.arabic: وَمَآ أَدۡرَىٰكَ مَا لَيۡلَةُ ٱلۡقَدۡرِ

data.price: 3. Leylatul Qhadri usuk baray muxxó ley, alfi alsak kayrih aysuk raaqa kinni.
data.arabic: لَيۡلَةُ ٱلۡقَدۡرِ خَيۡرٞ مِّنۡ أَلۡفِ شَهۡرٖ

data.price: 4. Tama barat malay kaa kee Jibriiliy ruuc deqsita qaraanak edde obta, sirmi Rabbih idnih, ummaan caagidiy Yalli woo liggidih addat mekle luk.
data.arabic: تَنَزَّلُ ٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةُ وَٱلرُّوحُ فِيهَا بِإِذۡنِ رَبِّهِم مِّن كُلِّ أَمۡرٖ

data.price: 5. Woo bari saayaay nagaaya, maaci maacissi iyyam fanah.
data.arabic: سَلَٰمٌ هِيَ حَتَّىٰ مَطۡلَعِ ٱلۡفَجۡرِ

data.price: 1. Kitab elle oobe marak yahuud kee nasaarak koroosite maraa kee Yallat agleyta haa mari, baxxaqqa geyyi haanam fanah edde sugen koroosannuk kata mara makkinnon.
data.arabic: لَمۡ يَكُنِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ مِنۡ أَهۡلِ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ وَٱلۡمُشۡرِكِينَ مُنفَكِّينَ حَتَّىٰ تَأۡتِيَهُمُ ٱلۡبَيِّنَةُ

data.price: 2. Woh Yallih farmoyta Mucammaday saytun kitooba (Qhuraan kinnuk) yakriye.
data.arabic: رَسُولٞ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ يَتۡلُواْ صُحُفٗا مُّطَهَّرَةٗ

data.price: 3. Woo kitoobah addal nummâ xaagittee kee qadaalatal tan amrittey massal tani tan.
data.arabic: فِيهَا كُتُبٞ قَيِّمَةٞ

data.price: 4. Mabaxsiminna kitab akah yontocowwime mari (yahuud kee nasaarak), baxxaqqa (Nabii kee Qhuraan kinnuk) keenih temeeteek wadir akke waytek.
data.arabic: وَمَا تَفَرَّقَ ٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُواْ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ إِلَّا مِنۢ بَعۡدِ مَا جَآءَتۡهُمُ ٱلۡبَيِّنَةُ

data.price: 5. Kaadu usun kalah kah amrisimeenim malón yallah qibaada caglisak, kaa yaqbudeeniih baatil diinittek inkih islaam diinî fanah keltaanaah salat soolisaanaah zaka yaceenim akke waytek, woh massa le diini kinni.
data.arabic: وَمَآ أُمِرُوٓاْ إِلَّا لِيَعۡبُدُواْ ٱللَّهَ مُخۡلِصِينَ لَهُ ٱلدِّينَ حُنَفَآءَ وَيُقِيمُواْ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَيُؤۡتُواْ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَۚ وَذَٰلِكَ دِينُ ٱلۡقَيِّمَةِ

data.price: 6. Diggah kitab elle oobe marak koroosittem kee Yallat agleyta haa mari, jahannam girah addal у an, teetil waarak, woo mari usun ginok umaaneh gacta ginó kinnon.
data.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ مِنۡ أَهۡلِ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ وَٱلۡمُشۡرِكِينَ فِي نَارِ جَهَنَّمَ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَآۚ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمۡ شَرُّ ٱلۡبَرِيَّةِ

data.price: 7. Diggah yeemeneeh meqe taamoomi abe marí, woo mari usun ginok tayse ginó kinnon.
data.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمۡ خَيۡرُ ٱلۡبَرِيَّةِ

data.price: 8. Ken galto ken Rabbih xaqul Qhiyaamah ayro qadni deqsitta jannootay guba weeqaytitte как gexxa, umman kay addal waarak. Yalli meqe taamoomi keenik raabiteh, kaadu usun kaak raabiteenih keenih abe konnaba, woh isi Rabbik meesite marih galto.
data.arabic: جَزَآؤُهُمۡ عِندَ رَبِّهِمۡ جَنَّٰتُ عَدۡنٖ تَجۡرِي مِن تَحۡتِهَا ٱلۡأَنۡهَٰرُ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَآ أَبَدٗاۖ رَّضِيَ ٱللَّهُ عَنۡهُمۡ وَرَضُواْ عَنۡهُۚ ذَٰلِكَ لِمَنۡ خَشِيَ رَبَّهُۥ

data.price: 1. Baaxó isi angoyyih tasgayyime waqdi.
data.arabic: إِذَا زُلۡزِلَتِ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ زِلۡزَالَهَا

data.price: 2. Kaadu baaxó isi addal taniimiy qilsi tayyaaqe waqdi (rabtem tekkek wohuk kalah tanim tekkek).
data.arabic: وَأَخۡرَجَتِ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ أَثۡقَالَهَا

data.price: 3. Kaadu seehadayti is lem macaay iyya wariggah?
data.arabic: وَقَالَ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ مَا لَهَا

data.price: 4. Woo ayró (qhiyaamah ayró) is isi bagul umaanee kee maqaanek abeenimih xaagu inkih warissah.
data.arabic: يَوۡمَئِذٖ تُحَدِّثُ أَخۡبَارَهَا

data.price: 5. Diggah ku Rabbi tet amriseemih sabbatah.
data.arabic: بِأَنَّ رَبَّكَ أَوۡحَىٰ لَهَا

data.price: 6. Woo ayró sinam soolô ballaaqak taduureh fixiixih anuk, ken taamoomi ken yaybulloonuh ken elle galtoonuh.
data.arabic: يَوۡمَئِذٖ يَصۡدُرُ ٱلنَّاسُ أَشۡتَاتٗا لِّيُرَوۡاْ أَعۡمَٰلَهُمۡ

data.price: 7. Tokkel maqaanek qunxa xuuneyti qilsah gide abe num, wohih galto able íe.
data.arabic: فَمَن يَعۡمَلۡ مِثۡقَالَ ذَرَّةٍ خَيۡرٗا يَرَهُۥ

data.price: 8. Kaadu umaanek qunxa xuuneyti qilsah gide abe num, wohih galto able íe.
data.arabic: وَمَن يَعۡمَلۡ مِثۡقَالَ ذَرَّةٖ شَرّٗا يَرَهُۥ

data.price: 1. Yalli qaduwwí fanah sissikuk yarde faarisiy fuftoh fuf iyyal xiibite.
data.arabic: وَٱلۡعَٰدِيَٰتِ ضَبۡحٗا

data.price: 2. Edde luk xukuuqunut ardi gibdah xinkilliq yayyaaqe faarisil xiibite.
data.arabic: فَٱلۡمُورِيَٰتِ قَدۡحٗا

data.price: 3. Edde luk qaduwwi maaca warara faarisil xiibite usuk garcit (karcit) anuk.
data.arabic: فَٱلۡمُغِيرَٰتِ صُبۡحٗا

data.price: 4. Tokkel is abtah tan ardih gibdah sawar (fulle) fuluk hayta.
data.arabic: فَأَثَرۡنَ بِهِۦ نَقۡعٗا

data.price: 5. Kaadu woo ardat isi macaxu qaduwwi macaxih addal macsissal xiibite.
data.arabic: فَوَسَطۡنَ بِهِۦ جَمۡعًا

data.price: 6. Diggah, seehadayti isi Rabbih niqmat yangaddi kinni.
data.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ لِرَبِّهِۦ لَكَنُودٞ

data.price: 7. Kaadu diggah usuk wohul isi nafsil sumaaqita num kinni.
data.arabic: وَإِنَّهُۥ عَلَىٰ ذَٰلِكَ لَشَهِيدٞ

data.price: 8. Kaadu diggah, usuk maaluh gibdi kacanu le num kinni.
data.arabic: وَإِنَّهُۥ لِحُبِّ ٱلۡخَيۡرِ لَشَدِيدٌ

data.price: 9. Tokkel mayaaxiga innaa! seehadayti kaa qambaltam magooqat enni ittam Yalli yayyaaqu waa waqdi cisab kee galtoh?
data.arabic: ۞ أَفَلَا يَعۡلَمُ إِذَا بُعۡثِرَ مَا فِي ٱلۡقُبُورِ

data.price: 10. Kaadu umaanee kee maqaanek alilwat qellisimak sugtem geytimtu waytam mayaaxiga innaa?
data.arabic: وَحُصِّلَ مَا فِي ٱلصُّدُورِ

data.price: 11. Diggah ken Rabbi ken kee ken taamoomik woo ayro adda yaaxigi kinni.
data.arabic: إِنَّ رَبَّهُم بِهِمۡ يَوۡمَئِذٖ لَّخَبِيرُۢ

data.price: 1. Al-Qhaariqa: is Qhiyaamah ayroy sinam lubbitte meesissot taagureh migaq kinni.
data.arabic: ٱلۡقَارِعَةُ

data.price: 2. Al-Qhaariqa is macaay?
data.arabic: مَا ٱلۡقَارِعَةُ

data.price: 3. Maca koo tiysixxigee Nabiyow Al- Qhaariqa kinnim?
data.arabic: وَمَآ أَدۡرَىٰكَ مَا ٱلۡقَارِعَةُ

data.price: 4. Seehadá fíxix kee magga gibdah laahintih (ufuy mali kinnuk) innah edde gacta ayró.
data.arabic: يَوۡمَ يَكُونُ ٱلنَّاسُ كَٱلۡفَرَاشِ ٱلۡمَبۡثُوثِ

data.price: 5. Kaadu qaleelá fakfaken suufíh (woh illi xagooru) innah edde gacta ayró.
data.arabic: وَتَكُونُ ٱلۡجِبَالُ كَٱلۡعِهۡنِ ٱلۡمَنفُوشِ

data.price: 6. Tokkel maqaanê miidaan как yiqilseeh yan numuh tugactek.
data.arabic: فَأَمَّا مَن ثَقُلَتۡ مَوَٰزِينُهُۥ

data.price: 7. Toysa usuk ruño le mano le jannatal.
data.arabic: فَهُوَ فِي عِيشَةٖ رَّاضِيَةٖ

data.price: 8. Kaadu miidaan haliffi akak iyye numuh tu gactek;
data.arabic: وَأَمَّا مَنۡ خَفَّتۡ مَوَٰزِينُهُۥ

data.price: 9. Toysa kay orbeyna haawiya deqsitta girá.
data.arabic: فَأُمُّهُۥ هَاوِيَةٞ

data.price: 10. Maca koo tiysixxigeeh Nabiyow is kinnim?
data.arabic: وَمَآ أَدۡرَىٰكَ مَا هِيَهۡ

data.price: 11. Is giray gibdi niqna íe kinni.
data.arabic: نَارٌ حَامِيَةُۢ

data.price: 1. Maaluu kee xaylô maggal sittal hiddottaanaah (tirtirissan) Yallih taaqatak sin agxisseh.
data.arabic: أَلۡهَىٰكُمُ ٱلتَّكَاثُرُ

data.price: 2. Rabi sin elelliiy magooqa guffu haytaanam fan.
data.arabic: حَتَّىٰ زُرۡتُمُ ٱلۡمَقَابِرَ

data.price: 3. Tónna hinnay sarrah aaxigetton! (rabi lakal).
data.arabic: كَلَّا سَوۡفَ تَعۡلَمُونَ

data.price: 4. Kaadu nummah sarrah aaxigettoniellecaboh ayroh digaala siinil obta waqdi.
data.arabic: ثُمَّ كَلَّا سَوۡفَ تَعۡلَمُونَ

data.price: 5. Tonna hinnay isin sin qambaltam asmatah aaxiginnitoonuy edde taniinimik waasimak tenen.
data.arabic: كَلَّا لَوۡ تَعۡلَمُونَ عِلۡمَ ٱلۡيَقِينِ

data.price: 6. Yalli xiibiteh diggah, jaciim deqsitta girá ablettoonumul.
data.arabic: لَتَرَوُنَّ ٱلۡجَحِيمَ

data.price: 7. Kaadu diggah asmat íe mablah tet abletton.
data.arabic: ثُمَّ لَتَرَوُنَّهَا عَيۡنَ ٱلۡيَقِينِ

data.price: 8. Tohuk lakal diggah woo ayró (Qhiyaamah ayro kinnuk) isin addunyal edde agxitak sugten niqmatak esserimetton.
data.arabic: ثُمَّ لَتُسۡـَٔلُنَّ يَوۡمَئِذٍ عَنِ ٱلنَّعِيمِ

data.price: 1. Yalli waktil xiibite.
data.arabic: وَٱلۡعَصۡرِ

data.price: 2. Diggah, seehadayti fínqat yaniimil.
data.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ لَفِي خُسۡرٍ

data.price: 3. Yeemene maray meqe taamoomi abeeh, cakkil sitta farriimeeh, sabril sitta farriime koh raaquh.
data.arabic: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ وَتَوَاصَوۡاْ بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَتَوَاصَوۡاْ بِٱلصَّبۡرِ

data.price: 1. Ummaan camiliy sinam qaybisaah ilqah Finqaa kee baati tan.
data.arabic: وَيۡلٞ لِّكُلِّ هُمَزَةٖ لُّمَزَةٍ

data.price: 2. Maalu gaaboyseeh lowalloowe num.
data.arabic: ٱلَّذِي جَمَعَ مَالٗا وَعَدَّدَهُۥ

data.price: 3. Diggah usuk isi maali isi waarisu waam yakkale addunyal.
data.arabic: يَحۡسَبُ أَنَّ مَالَهُۥٓ أَخۡلَدَهُۥ

data.price: 4. Caagid usuk eile yakkale inna hinna! Diggah usuk cutama deqsitta giray edde qambisinnaanihim bokookissát gaşyime le.
data.arabic: كَلَّاۖ لَيُنۢبَذَنَّ فِي ٱلۡحُطَمَةِ

data.price: 5. nabiyow Maca koo tiysixxigeeh cutamá kinnim?
data.arabic: وَمَآ أَدۡرَىٰكَ مَا ٱلۡحُطَمَةُ

data.price: 6. Is Yallih giray ursumteeh hadiidigsinte kinni.
data.arabic: نَارُ ٱللَّهِ ٱلۡمُوقَدَةُ

data.price: 7. Is leh tan niqnah gibdah xagarak sorkocobbaxittel bukku itta.
data.arabic: ٱلَّتِي تَطَّلِعُ عَلَى ٱلۡأَفۡـِٔدَةِ

data.price: 8. Diggah is keenil alfimteh kaluqqu itte.
data.arabic: إِنَّهَا عَلَيۡهِم مُّؤۡصَدَةٞ

data.price: 9. Usun makaadooday ruubumut tanih addat axawat anuk. (teetik awqe waanâ gidah).
data.arabic: فِي عَمَدٖ مُّمَدَّدَةِۭ

data.price: L Nabiyow! Ku Rabbi dakanu leh у an marak kah abenna Matablannaa?
data.arabic: أَلَمۡ تَرَ كَيۡفَ فَعَلَ رَبُّكَ بِأَصۡحَٰبِ ٱلۡفِيلِ

data.price: 2. Yalli Ken urna mala fïnqa maabinnaa?
data.arabic: أَلَمۡ يَجۡعَلۡ كَيۡدَهُمۡ فِي تَضۡلِيلٖ

data.price: 3. Kaadu haadâ butta buttah keenit ruube itta kataatak
data.arabic: وَأَرۡسَلَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ طَيۡرًا أَبَابِيلَ

data.price: 4. Xeetiy cararte kallak yani keenil qambissa.
data.arabic: تَرۡمِيهِم بِحِجَارَةٖ مِّن سِجِّيلٖ

data.price: 5. tokkel ruma yekke caffaa kee cafulay yonkommeh inna ken abe.
data.arabic: فَجَعَلَهُمۡ كَعَصۡفٖ مَّأۡكُولِۭ

data.price: 1. Qhureyshi deqsittah tan kedo luk sugte qaadáa kee edde sugen saay ma qajjibsittaanaa!
data.arabic: لِإِيلَٰفِ قُرَيۡشٍ

data.price: 2. Ken qaada gilal yamanâ fanah arhoh aban safar kee cagay shaamâ fanah aban safar kinni meesite kalah.(Yalli kecnih yecee amaan kee niqmata).
data.arabic: إِۦلَٰفِهِمۡ رِحۡلَةَ ٱلشِّتَآءِ وَٱلصَّيۡفِ

data.price: 3. Toysa a Qarih Rabbi (kaqbá kinnuk) yaqbudoonay qibaadá kaah caglisak.
data.arabic: فَلۡيَعۡبُدُواْ رَبَّ هَٰذَا ٱلۡبَيۡتِ

data.price: 4. Woh Yallay qululuk ken yoskomeeh, conxok amaan (saay) keenih yecee kinni.
data.arabic: ٱلَّذِيٓ أَطۡعَمَهُم مِّن جُوعٖ وَءَامَنَهُم مِّنۡ خَوۡفِۭ

data.price: 1. Galtoh ayró dirabboysa numih caalat yoh warisey?
data.arabic: أَرَءَيۡتَ ٱلَّذِي يُكَذِّبُ بِٱلدِّينِ

data.price: 2. Woh qayxixxu Íe cakkik gibdi gutqoh gutqa num kinni.
data.arabic: فَذَٰلِكَ ٱلَّذِي يَدُعُّ ٱلۡيَتِيمَ

data.price: 3. Kaadu usuk tu dagoyta adoobisaanamah sinam milsiisaay isih maaba.
data.arabic: وَلَا يَحُضُّ عَلَىٰ طَعَامِ ٱلۡمِسۡكِينِ

data.price: 4. Salat abah yan maray (munaafiqhiin kinnuk) yallak galto edde garrise waah gibdi digaalá tan.
data.arabic: فَوَيۡلٞ لِّلۡمُصَلِّينَ

data.price: 5. Usun sinni salat waala maray Íe waktil kaa abewa.
data.arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ هُمۡ عَن صَلَاتِهِمۡ سَاهُونَ

data.price: 6. Usun yoobulah sinam sinni tablenkeh meqe taama aba mara kinnon.
data.arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ هُمۡ يُرَآءُونَ

data.price: 7. Kaadu cine waanam, cina mara gacsah, mingiilaay yakmeenih yaaqubeenim kee wohuk kalah taniimik.
data.arabic: وَيَمۡنَعُونَ ٱلۡمَاعُونَ

data.price: 1. Diggah Nabiyow nanu kawthar deqsita doray jannatti addal yani koh necee.
data.arabic: إِنَّآ أَعۡطَيۡنَٰكَ ٱلۡكَوۡثَرَ

data.price: 2. Tokkel Nabiyow salat kee masgaadá, isi Rabbih caglisak ab.
data.arabic: فَصَلِّ لِرَبِّكَ وَٱنۡحَرۡ

data.price: 3. Nabiyow diggah koo kee atu tirtok luk temeetem niqbi num, usuk samad maliiy kulli kayrik yiggiriqqeh.
data.arabic: إِنَّ شَانِئَكَ هُوَ ٱلۡأَبۡتَرُ

data.price: 1. Nabiyow koroosite marak ixxic: kee ta koroseey!
data.arabic: قُلۡ يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلۡكَٰفِرُونَ

data.price: 2. Isin taqbuden Numtinwellittee kee sin yallitte maqbuda,
data.arabic: لَآ أَعۡبُدُ مَا تَعۡبُدُونَ

data.price: 3. Kaadu isin anu aqbudeh an inki yalla yaqbude mara hinniton.
data.arabic: وَلَآ أَنتُمۡ عَٰبِدُونَ مَآ أَعۡبُدُ

data.price: 4. Kaadu anu isin taqbudeenim ( у allak kalah tanim kinnuk). yaqbude num hinniyo.
data.arabic: وَلَآ أَنَا۠ عَابِدٞ مَّا عَبَدتُّمۡ

data.price: 5. Kaadu isin anu aqbudeh an inki yalla yaqbude mara hinniton.
data.arabic: وَلَآ أَنتُمۡ عَٰبِدُونَ مَآ أَعۡبُدُ

data.price: 6. Isin sinni diini Litoonuuh, anu inni diini liyo.
data.arabic: لَكُمۡ دِينُكُمۡ وَلِيَ دِينِ

data.price: 1. Nabiyow Yallih qokol (cató) kee makki fakim koh Yamaate waqdi.
data.arabic: إِذَا جَآءَ نَصۡرُ ٱللَّهِ وَٱلۡفَتۡحُ

data.price: 2. Kaadu seehadá Yallih diinit butta buttah culah table waqdi,
data.arabic: وَرَأَيۡتَ ٱلنَّاسَ يَدۡخُلُونَ فِي دِينِ ٱللَّهِ أَفۡوَاجٗا

data.price: 3. Toysa Ku-Rabbi saytunnos kaa faylisak, kaadu dambi cabti kaal esser,, diggah usuk isil gaca marak gacim (toobat kinnuk) oggolaah qafu aba Rabbi kinnik.
data.arabic: فَسَبِّحۡ بِحَمۡدِ رَبِّكَ وَٱسۡتَغۡفِرۡهُۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ تَوَّابَۢا

data.price: 1. Abii lahab namma gaba finqiteh, kaadu usuk finqiteh.
data.arabic: تَبَّتۡ يَدَآ أَبِي لَهَبٖ وَتَبَّ

data.price: 2. Kay maaluy yedderee kee kay xaylo Kaah xiqtem maliiy yallih digaalak tu kaak ma çatta.
data.arabic: مَآ أَغۡنَىٰ عَنۡهُ مَالُهُۥ وَمَا كَسَبَ

data.price: 3. Usuk Кахха ura-le giray hadiidigta Culele.
data.arabic: سَيَصۡلَىٰ نَارٗا ذَاتَ لَهَبٖ

data.price: 4. Kaadu kay barray bocó takkuqih tani, girá kaâ luk culele.
data.arabic: وَٱمۡرَأَتُهُۥ حَمَّالَةَ ٱلۡحَطَبِ

data.price: 5. Tet fıllat cambok yan akatay is jahannam giráh addal edde diggalsimta yan.
data.arabic: فِي جِيدِهَا حَبۡلٞ مِّن مَّسَدِۭ

data.price: 1. Ixxic nabiyow:usuk Yalla inkittu kinniih, agleyta mali.
data.arabic: قُلۡ هُوَ ٱللَّهُ أَحَدٌ

data.price: 2. Yalli cagalah caagiidaa kee faxaanamih magdabah eleelitan Rabbi kinni
data.arabic: ٱللَّهُ ٱلصَّمَدُ

data.price: 3. Yalli maxalinnaay, Kaa xaltem matan.
data.arabic: لَمۡ يَلِدۡ وَلَمۡ يُولَدۡ

data.price: 4. Kaadu makkinnaay masuginnaay mayan, inkittuy kaa ceelaah kaa qeedaala.
data.arabic: وَلَمۡ يَكُن لَّهُۥ كُفُوًا أَحَدُۢ

data.price: 1. Ixxic Nabiyow: maaca gine Rabbi maggansitaah kaa eleelita.
data.arabic: قُلۡ أَعُوذُ بِرَبِّ ٱلۡفَلَقِ

data.price: 2. Usuk ginni heemih umaanek.
data.arabic: مِن شَرِّ مَا خَلَقَ

data.price: 3. Kaadu gibdi dite leh yan barih umaanek kaa maggansita, usuk (bar kinnuk) culah yan waqdi.
data.arabic: وَمِن شَرِّ غَاسِقٍ إِذَا وَقَبَ

data.price: 4. Kaadu kuntuubaabil baabah tuf- tufó abtah tan sayyóh umaanek koo maggansita.
data.arabic: وَمِن شَرِّ ٱلنَّفَّٰثَٰتِ فِي ٱلۡعُقَدِ

data.price: 5. Kaadu kuuxe waynanli kuuxe waynan aba waqdih umaanek koo maggansita.
data.arabic: وَمِن شَرِّ حَاسِدٍ إِذَا حَسَدَ

data.price: 1. Ixxic Nabiyow: seehada gine Rabbi maggansita.
data.arabic: قُلۡ أَعُوذُ بِرَبِّ ٱلنَّاسِ

data.price: 2. Seehadah amoytay ken yamlike maggansita.(Yalla kinnuk).
data.arabic: مَلِكِ ٱلنَّاسِ

data.price: 3. Seehada kah rammittaah, taqbude Yalla maggansita.
data.arabic: إِلَٰهِ ٱلنَّاسِ

data.price: 4. Waswaseynah yan sheytanay, Yallih cusiyyak garcitan waqdi sinam waswasaah, Yalla cusan waqdi qellitah umaanek koo maggansita.
data.arabic: مِن شَرِّ ٱلۡوَسۡوَاسِ ٱلۡخَنَّاسِ

data.price: 5. Kaay(sheytan kinnuk)seehadâ sorkocobbaxittet waswasaa kee umaane culsa.
data.arabic: ٱلَّذِي يُوَسۡوِسُ فِي صُدُورِ ٱلنَّاسِ

data.price: 6. Jinni sheytoonaa kee seehadâ sheytoonak tan waswasak.
data.arabic: مِنَ ٱلۡجِنَّةِ وَٱلنَّاسِ

chapters: She that is to be Examined
